Description:
Timeless Classic
This 4 bedroom 2 bath Post War classic weatherboard home retains a sense of history and blends old world elegance with modern convenience showcasing internal spaces rich in textures and views. Multiple living zones maximise the comfort of the whole family. The master suite has a look and feel of a vacation hideaway with a welcoming feel that conveniently detaches from the family hustle and bustle.
A large fireplace (currently fitted with gas heater) centres the living room, and a vast bank of windows provide expansive views of the front verandah and garden. The central hallway feeds off to 3 bedrooms, central bathroom and the kitchen family area that stays clutter-free thanks to plentiful drawers and cabinets. Stay engaged in food preparation and socialising with a mix of warm colours and textures that make this kitchen feel comfortable and cosy. Rich cork tiles echo the luxuriant greens of the garden's expansive plantings. A covered verandah provides comfortably shaded outdoor space and offers the ideal spot for outdoor dining.
The home sits on a large, meticulously maintained parcel that offers a private rear garden and the workshop-garage boasts electronically controlled doors comfortably accommodating large vehicles. Solar panels provide all year round electricity that will cut your energy costs down to the pennies and bore water will do the same.
A tranquil street, close to parks, schools transport and shops.
Insights: 21 Helena St, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
CLASSIC CHARM ON OVER 700SQM IN QUIET FAMILY LOCATION
In gorgeous condition thanks to a caring owner who was here for 2 decades, this home on a generous block of over 700SQM (approx.) in a court like position provides instant comfort and appeal for a young family or market savvy investor looking to cash in on the Clayton South boom. Fronted by a brick fence, lovely gardens and a covered front porch, you step inside to find a light filled home featuring a generous lounge/dining room with a split system air conditioner, that's complemented by a family/meals area incorporating the modern kitchen with a double wall oven, 6 burner cook top, dishwasher and integrated laundry facilities. There are 3 robed bedrooms including the master that has a walk in wardrobe and a semi ensuite to match the family bathroom and central toilet. There's also a gas heater for winter comfort and outside there's a huge backyard with a paved entertaining patio, a variety of fertile fruit trees and a single garage. And this perfectly quiet position just seals the deal with Namatjira Park, buses, 2 primary schools, Clarinda Shopping Centre and central Clayton all just minutes away.
Insights: 43 Ester Crescent, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
IDEAL WAY TO BEGIN, ASTUTE INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
Stylishly appointed and wonderfully low-maintenance, this contemporary double storey home is part of a quiet cul-de-sac meters from Westall train station and minutes to Westall Primary and Secondary and a short bus ride to Monash University. A spacious, open design incorporates a light-filled living/meals area and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ample storage space. 3 robed bedrooms, main with ensuite/walk-in robe are complemented by a beautifully bright skylit bathroom, ducted heating, split system cooling, powder room, double garage and rear courtyard the perfect place to relax or entertain. An ideal opportunity for the first home buyer, student or savvy investor, surrounded by excellent lifestyle amenities.
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.

Ideally positioned on the ground floor of a well-maintained complex, this appealing apartment is a sensational choice for those starting out, downsizers and astute investors alike. An immaculate interior offers an updated modern kitchen, open living/meals area, 2 robed bedrooms and contemporary fully tiled bathroom. An allocated car space puts the finishing touch to an opportunity that's certain to be sold - and offers significant investment or lifestyle upside, prominently situated minutes to schools, train station and local shops.

Description:
Recognise The Value, Invest In Its Future
Displaying exceptional proportions and outstanding flexibility, this unique home offers a wide range of opportunities to ensure a successful future. Maximise your investment potential with the possibility of student accommodation, renovate the existing layout to create your own lavish domain or utilise its attractive land dimensions and redevelop (STCA). Current day spaces offer Lounge/Dining rooms, bright timber Kitchen with adjoining Family/Meals area, upper level Rumpus, 6 Bedroom, 2 bathroom, large paved courtyard, heating/AC, ample storage, a large workshop plus tandem garage and could easily accommodate growing or extended families. Situated in a quiet court location only few steps to Grange Reserve, and minutes to schools, train station, Springvale Central Shopping Centre and Monash University. Land size of 706m2 (approx).

Description:
Cosy, Convenient, Comfortable and Clayton Central
Enjoy all that life has to offer without even getting in your car, as everything is at your door step. Start your day with a walk at Namatjira Park, go for a swim in the Aquatic Centre, walk around the corner and grab a coffee, catch a train to work, grab dinner from your favourite restaurant and swing by to the local GP after a big weekend and finish your grocery shopping in your local supermarket or specialty stores and come home to enjoy your beautiful home. All this within 5-10 minutes from each other.... No this is not a dream, it is what you can look forward to enjoying if you are the lucky buyer of this 2 Bedroom Apartment in ABSOLUTE CLAYTON CENTRAL LOCATION.
Features:
2 Bedrooms with BIR
Large North Facing Balcony, Sunny but Private
Underground Parking, with heaps of Visitors parking
New Carpet, Modern fittings and Inclusions
Secure Entry Location, Location, Location.......... Estimated Rental Return ($350-$380pw)

Description:
Renovated Beauty in Desirable Pocket!
Positioned perfectly in a highly sought area of Clayton South, this unique residence is ideal for the prudent investor or home owner. Tucked away in a quiet cul-de-sac, there is no doubt that the home will cater your enviable lifestyle, where modern living meets tranquil environment. Comprising of:
- 3 bedrooms all with BIR
- Sizable Master w/ en-suite
- Spacious lounge leading into dining space
- Brand new kitchen
- Large family area providing 2nd living space
- Newly polished floorboards and painted interior
- Security Alarm system
- Ducted Heating, separate air-conditioning
- Double Garage, Double Carport with additional car accommodation
Nearby reserves, close vicinity to shops in Springvale & Westall, Westall Secondary College, Monash University, train station and easy access to major arterials, convenience is at a premium without compromising your privacy. Don't miss out. Call today!

Description:
AFFORDABLE AND VERSATILE
PRIOR OFFERS INVITED.
Resting on a block of approximately 590m2 this property offers an affordable entry into the hot Clayton South market.
Whether you're looking to start from scratch and build a luxurious new family home or explore the potential as a 2 unit site the choice is yours. All options are Subject to Council Approval.
While this classic weatherboard home retains much of its original style and feel, it offers its new owner many options for its future.
It features polished floors throughout, a generous lounge/dining room with gas heater and an adjoining kitchen with upright oven/stove.
There are 3 bedrooms including the master with built in wardrobes and a family bathroom with separate toilet and a full laundry that gives you access the north facing backyard and single garage.
In a quiet position the home is still just minutes away from buses, Heatherton Park, Westall Primary School, Secondary College and train station.

Description:
Conveniently Located with a View!
This 2 bedroom apartment, close to train station, will impress the most discerning of buyers. With quality carpets, fixtures and fittings, this home is approx 3 years old and boasts: 2 bedrooms with built in robes, master with ensuite, large living, dining, tiles to all wet areas, well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops. The contemporary bathroom is a real WOW, with a European style laundry included and balcony for those warm balmy nights to relax on. Other features include: air-conditioning, heating and undercover car space on title. With high rental returns achievable and in such a convenient location, this is surely an opportunity not to be missed, to live in or invest.

Description:
Lucrative development opportunity
Providing all the certainty of a safe and secure property investment, this substantial land package is ripe for multi-home, multi-level development now (STCA). The site currently holds two neat and tidy 3 bedroom units offering instantly enjoyable living and attractive returns. Moments from Westall train station, local schools, shopping centres, parklands and a short drive to Monash Medical Centre and Monash University, the possibilities with this significant holding of land are only limited by one's imagination. Inspect today to size up your many options!
* Premium development opportunity
* Two 3 bedroom units
* Solid brick and weatherboard
* Large living areas with separate kitchen and adjoining dining area
* Bathrooms with baths
* Separate laundry
* Double lock-up garage
* Gas heating in both units, air conditioner in one unit
* Close to transport, schools, shopping, parklands

Description:
Ground floor Heaven, Live in or Invest - Under Contract
Calling first home buyers, investors or one who wants to downsize and live in one of the best of Clayton's locations. Renovated with all quality fixtures and fittings will impress everyone who looks for good location, space and low maintenance lifestyle. In a well maintained double brick building of only 4 units, provide outstanding opportunity to live within walking distance to Clayton South Primary School, beautiful Namatjira Park, Clayton shops, Community Centre, Train Station and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and Monash Freeway. Comprising formal entry, spacious lounge, modern kitchen with gas cooking and good size meals area, 2 large bedrooms with built in robes, family bathroom with washing machine taps, and a secure car space on title. This rare find presents great value with wonderful future prospects. Don't miss out! Call Rene for an inspection today 0413 330 357.

Description:
LIGHT, FRESH & AFFORDABLE!
While this home has been well cared for throughout its life, a recent freshen up has given it a modern edge to make it both more appealing and comfortable. On an easily maintained block and surrounded by neat gardens, the home maintains its classic faÃ§ade and inside its light, airy and freshly painted. Polished hardwood floors feature throughout enhancing the L-shaped lounge/dining room with heater and air conditioner as well as the pristine kitchen with gas oven, updated tile benchtops and included meals area. There are 3 bedrooms that all feature built in wardrobes plus an updated bathroom, dual access toilet and full laundry. Outside there's a double garage and generous driveway for additional cars plus a private backyard for playing and entertaining. In a quiet street near buses, Clarinda Shopping Centre and Clayton South Primary School, you can also access central Clayton's shops and trains in minutes.

Description:
Prized position, spacious style
Just one block from Westall train station and Westall Secondary College, this superb three bedroom townhouse sets the standard in this sought-after neighbourhood. Enjoy dual access through the front door or remote-controlled garage and discover two stunning levels with the ground floor leading to a gourmet kitchen with Fisher and Paykel appliances including a drawer dishwasher. Take advantage of super-sized living and dining areas flowing through to a private and paved patio, perfect for entertaining family and friends. Head upstairs to three large bedrooms with the main offering the convenience of a stylish en suite and walk-in-robe. Investors and owner-occupiers will purchase with confidence. Inspect today!
* 3 large bedrooms with mirrored BIRs, main with en suite and WIR
* Super-spacious open-plan living and dining areas
* Chef's kitchen with Fisher and Paykel oven and drawer dishwasher
* Luxurious and large bathroom with bath and oversized shower
* Deep, single remote-controlled garage featuring internal access plus off-street parking for one
* Entertainers' paved and private patio leading to rear yard
* Separate laundry
* Ample, integrated storage solutions
* Stylish tiling, plush carpeting
* Gas ducted heating plus split-system heating and cooling
* Moments from train station, shopping, schools, Monash Medical Centre and University

Description:
A CLASSIC HOME ON AROUND 805SQM WITH DEVELOPMENT POTENTIAL
This classic weatherboard home on around 805sqm has been kept in great condition throughout its life. And with that amount of land there are many options for its new owner to explore including retaining the beautiful home, building a new unit behind or start from scratch and build multiple units (all options STCA).
Fronted by a picket fence and lovely gardens, the home boasts a beautiful faÃ§ade with covered porch and inside you find ornate high ceilings, original timber flooring and decorative fireplace inserts in 3 positions.
The central hallway is flanked by 2 large bedrooms including the master and ensuite and there's also a 3rd bedroom and family bathroom further in.
The generous lounge/dining room is complemented by a large modern kitchen with stainless appliances and a walk in pantry.
Ducted heating, a split system air conditioner also feature along with a utility room and 3rd toilet.
Outside there's a double width driveway, double garage and a long deck overlooks the big backyard.
A handy position completes the package with buses and Westall primary and secondary school in the street and you can walk to Rosebank Avenue shops and Westall train station.

Description:
An Amazing Unit in a Brilliant Location!
Sale by Set Date 8/3/2016
An exciting affordable opportunity for starters or investors wanting to live or invest in this private home
in this sought after area, conveniently situated in peaceful and quiet surrounds.
This well presented unit comprises of a light-filled hallway, open plan lounge/dining, kitchen, 2 large bedrooms, bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Step outside and enjoy BBQs with family and friends in the low maintenance backyard and access to the single remote controlled garage. Features include ducted heating, high ceilings, stainless steel appliances, floorboards plus more.
Brilliantly located within walking distance to Springvale West Primary School, Heatherton Park, Spring Valley Golf Club and Springvale Plaza. Within a short drive to Springvale Shopping Centre, Springvale and Sandown train stations, schools, shops, parks and all amenities. Easy access to Westall Road, Princes Highway, Eastlink and convenient commute to city.
Don't miss out on this exceptional unit situated in a brilliant location and enjoy the quality lifestyle in this fabulous home with
An Absolute Winner for the Astute Investor!

Jenny Sudra : 0422 991 593

Description:
Reside, Renovate Or Redevelop North Facing on 720sqm Approx!
Occupying a superior north facing allotment of 720m2 (approx) and boasting a preferred north-facing rear, this well-presented 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home is packed to the brim with future potential. Subdivide to construct a rear unit whilst keeping the existing home or build multiple townhouses or use the full block to create a 5-star family home revelling in its ultra-convenient locale (STCA). One of the first original homes on the street being sold for the first time in 56 years, the immaculate layout offers a lounge, kitchen/meals area, gas heater, split system AC and remote access single lock up garage. A prized location sure to appeal to home buyers, investors and developers. Within walking distance to Clayton Shopping strip, train station, local schools, parks, and only minutes away from Monash University and Medical Centre.
PHOTO 'ID' MUST BE PROVIDED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS AND PHONE NUMBER WITH ALL ENQUIRIES

Description:
2 Bed Unit in a Location Filled with Convenience
This perfectly located unit is ripe for astute investors or first home buyers. With a sun filled north facing entrance and being only a moment from the Westall Train Station, Rosebank Avenue shops and both primary and secondary schools, this unit offers 2 gracious bedrooms with built in robes, open kitchen and meals area, flexible living area, LED downlights throughout, air conditioning, gas heating, central bathroom and being the only unit in the complex with a large private front yard.
Please contact me and I'd be happy to organise a time for you to inspect this gem.
